name: Rodolf
description:
Game made for the Ludum Dare 46.

ENG : You're Sam, a babysitter who needs money to buy the new GameBoxStation 6. A family leaves you their baby that you have to keep for 5 days. You have to find the bottles in the house to feed the baby but be careful to manage well because at night, the nice baby will make you live a real hell ...

FR : Tu es Sam, un babysitter qui a besoin de fric pour s'acheter la nouvelle GameBoxStation 6. Une famille te laisse son bébé que tu dois garder 5 jours. Tu dois trouver les biberons dans la maison pour nourrir le bébé mais attention à bien gérer car la nuit, le gentil bébé te fera vivre un véritable enfer...

Play with Keyboard or Gamepad ! Enjoy ! 

This is our first gamejam. We had a lot of fun, I hope you have as much fun as we do ! ;)

Made with Unity.

Music : "Menu" by Kok & "5Keer" by Hicham Chahidi

2D Artist : Amandine Casset @Mandin (https://www.instagram.com/mandin.draws/)

Game Developer : Bastien Serge @Nurk (https://twitter.com/Aikannaro)
